text: I was growing up in Baltimore Maryland
in the 60s during the space race
these two stopped classes to watch these
milestone space missions I really got
the sense of how vital this was we are
bred to explore we are going to leave
this planet it's going to happen whether
it's the moon Mars those are just
destinations on the journey they're not
an end unto themselves if we can put a
man on the moon we can do anything I'm
optimistic that we are on the right path
to do that and to stick with it so that
we can put people where we want them it
may take us 15 20 25 30 years to explore
places like Europa and even beyond
it's an in heat in us to explore our
solar system and potentially the rest of
the universe we really need to have that
global vision to achieve what I think
will be humanity's finest hour
you
